00045 const char CellStoreV0::DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC[10]           =
00046     { 'D','a','t','a','-','-','-','-','-','-' };
00047 const char CellStoreV0::INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC[10]    =
00048     { 'I','d','x','F','i','x','-','-','-','-' };
00049 const char CellStoreV0::INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC[10] =
00050     { 'I','d','x','V','a','r','-','-','-','-' };

00053   const uint32_t MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING = 3;

00056 CellStoreV0::CellStoreV0(Filesystem *filesys)
00057   : m_filesys(filesys), m_filename(), m_fd(-1), m_compressor(0), m_buffer(0),
00058     m_fix_index_buffer(0), m_var_index_buffer(0), m_memory_consumed(0),
00059     m_outstanding_appends(0), m_offset(0), m_last_key(0), m_file_length(0),
00060     m_disk_usage(0), m_file_id(0), m_uncompressed_blocksize(0) {
00061   m_file_id = FileBlockCache::get_next_file_id();
00062   assert(sizeof(float) == 4);
00063 }

00066 
00067 CellStoreV0::~CellStoreV0() {
00068   try {
00069     delete m_compressor;
00070 
00071     if (m_fd != -1)
00072       m_filesys->close(m_fd);
00073   }
00074   catch (Exception &e) {
00075     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Error closing DFS client: "<< e << HT_END;
00076   }
00077   if (m_memory_consumed)
00078     Global::memory_tracker.subtract(m_memory_consumed);
00079 }

00084       (BlockCompressionCodec::Type)m_trailer.compression_type);

00107 void
00108 CellStoreV0::create(const char *fname, uint32_t blocksize,
00109                     const std::string &compressor) {
00110   m_buffer.reserve(blocksize*4);
00111 
00112   m_fd = -1;
00113   m_offset = 0;
00114   m_last_key = 0;
00115   m_fix_index_buffer.reserve(blocksize);
00116   m_var_index_buffer.reserve(blocksize);
00117 
00118   m_uncompressed_data = 0.0;
00119   m_compressed_data = 0.0;
00120 
00121   m_trailer.clear();
00122   m_trailer.blocksize = blocksize;
00123   m_uncompressed_blocksize = blocksize;
00124 
00125   m_filename = fname;
00126 
00127   m_start_row = "";
00128   m_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00129 
00130   if (compressor.empty())
00131     m_trailer.compression_type = CompressorFactory::parse_block_codec_spec(
00132         "lzo", m_compressor_args);
00133   else
00134     m_trailer.compression_type = CompressorFactory::parse_block_codec_spec(
00135         compressor, m_compressor_args);
00136 
00137   m_compressor = CompressorFactory::create_block_codec(
00138       (BlockCompressionCodec::Type)m_trailer.compression_type,
00139       m_compressor_args);
00140 
00141   m_fd = m_filesys->create(m_filename, true, -1, -1, -1);
00142   
00143 }

00145 
00146 int CellStoreV0::add(const Key &key, const ByteString value) {
00147   EventPtr event_ptr;
00148   DynamicBuffer zbuf;
00149 
00150   if (key.revision > m_trailer.revision)
00151     m_trailer.revision = key.revision;
00152 
00153   if (m_buffer.fill() > m_uncompressed_blocksize) {
00154     BlockCompressionHeader header(DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00155 
00156     add_index_entry(m_last_key, m_offset);
00157 
00158     m_uncompressed_data += (float)m_buffer.fill();
00159     m_compressor->deflate(m_buffer, zbuf, header);
00160     m_compressed_data += (float)zbuf.fill();
00161     m_buffer.clear();
00162 
00163     uint64_t llval = ((uint64_t)m_trailer.blocksize
00164         * (uint64_t)m_uncompressed_data) / (uint64_t)m_compressed_data;
00165     m_uncompressed_blocksize = (uint32_t)llval;
00166 
00167     if (m_outstanding_appends >= MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING) {
00168       if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00169         HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s", m_filename.c_str(),
00170             Hypertable::Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00171         return -1;
00172       }
00173       m_outstanding_appends--;
00174     }
00175 
00176     size_t zlen = zbuf.fill();
00177     StaticBuffer send_buf(zbuf);
00178 
00179     try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler); }
00180     catch (Exception &e) {
00181       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s",
00182                 m_filename.c_str(), e.what());
00183       return -1;
00184     }
00185     m_outstanding_appends++;
00186     m_offset += zlen;
00187   }
00188 
00189   size_t value_len = value.length();
00190 
00191   m_buffer.ensure(key.length + value_len);
00192 
00193   m_last_key.ptr = m_buffer.add_unchecked(key.serial.ptr, key.length);
00194   m_buffer.add_unchecked(value.ptr, value_len);
00195 
00196   m_trailer.total_entries++;
00197 
00198   return 0;
00199 }

00203 void CellStoreV0::finalize(TableIdentifier *table_identifier) {
00204   EventPtr event_ptr;
00205   size_t zlen;
00206   DynamicBuffer zbuf(0);
00207   size_t len;
00208   uint8_t *base;
00209   SerializedKey key;
00210   StaticBuffer send_buf;
00211 
00212   if (m_buffer.fill() > 0) {
00213     BlockCompressionHeader header(DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00214 
00215     add_index_entry(m_last_key, m_offset);
00216 
00217     m_uncompressed_data += (float)m_buffer.fill();
00218     m_compressor->deflate(m_buffer, zbuf, header);
00219     m_compressed_data += (float)zbuf.fill();
00220 
00221     zlen = zbuf.fill();
00222     send_buf = zbuf;
00223 
00224     if (m_outstanding_appends >= MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING) {
00225       if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00226         HT_THROWF(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00227                   "Problem finalizing CellStore file '%s' : %s",
00228                   m_filename.c_str(),
00229                   Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00230       m_outstanding_appends--;
00231     }
00232 
00233     m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler);
00234 
00235     m_outstanding_appends++;
00236     m_offset += zlen;
00237   }
00238 
00239   m_buffer.free();
00240 
00241   m_trailer.fix_index_offset = m_offset;
00242   if (m_uncompressed_data == 0)
00243     m_trailer.compression_ratio = 1.0;
00244   else
00245     m_trailer.compression_ratio = m_compressed_data / m_uncompressed_data;
00246   m_trailer.version = 0;
00247 
00251   base = m_fix_index_buffer.release(&len);
00252   m_fix_index_buffer.reserve(len);
00253   m_fix_index_buffer.add_unchecked(base, len);
00254   delete [] base;
00255   base = m_var_index_buffer.release(&len);
00256   m_var_index_buffer.reserve(len);
00257   m_var_index_buffer.add_unchecked(base, len);
00258   delete [] base;
00259 
00263   {
00264     BlockCompressionHeader header(INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00265     m_compressor->deflate(m_fix_index_buffer, zbuf, header);
00266   }
00267 
00268   zlen = zbuf.fill();
00269   send_buf = zbuf;
00270 
00271   m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler);
00272 
00273   m_outstanding_appends++;
00274   m_offset += zlen;
00275 
00279   {
00280     BlockCompressionHeader header(INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00281     m_trailer.var_index_offset = m_offset;
00282     m_compressor->deflate(m_var_index_buffer, zbuf, header, m_trailer.size());
00283   }
00284 
00288   uint32_t offset;
00289   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr = m_fix_index_buffer.base;
00290   m_var_index_buffer.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.base;
00291   for (size_t i=0; i<m_trailer.index_entries; i++) {
00292     // variable portion
00293     key.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.ptr;
00294     m_var_index_buffer.ptr += key.length();
00295     // fixed portion (e.g. offset)
00296     memcpy(&offset, m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, sizeof(offset));
00297     m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00298     m_index.insert(m_index.end(), IndexMap::value_type(key, offset));
00299     if (i == m_trailer.index_entries/2) {
00300       record_split_row(m_var_index_buffer.ptr);
00301     }
00302   }
00303 
00304   // deallocate fix index data
00305   delete [] m_fix_index_buffer.release();
00306 
00307   // write filter_offset (empty for now)
00308   m_trailer.filter_offset = m_offset + zbuf.fill();
00309 
00310   // Add table information
00311   m_trailer.table_id = table_identifier->id;
00312   m_trailer.table_generation = table_identifier->generation;
00313 
00314   m_trailer.serialize(zbuf.ptr);
00315   zbuf.ptr += m_trailer.size();
00316 
00317   zlen = zbuf.fill();
00318   send_buf = zbuf;
00319 
00320   m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf);
00321 
00322   m_outstanding_appends++;
00323   m_offset += zlen;
00324 
00326   m_filesys->close(m_fd);
00327 
00329   m_file_length = m_offset;
00330 
00332   m_fd = m_filesys->open(m_filename);
00333 
00334   m_disk_usage = (uint32_t)m_file_length;
00335 
00336   m_memory_consumed = sizeof(CellStoreV0) + m_var_index_buffer.size
00337       + (m_index.size() * 2 * sizeof(IndexMap::value_type));
00338   Global::memory_tracker.add(m_memory_consumed);
00339 
00340   delete m_compressor;
00341   m_compressor = 0;
00342 
00343 }

00346 
00350 void CellStoreV0::add_index_entry(const SerializedKey key, uint32_t offset) {
00351 
00352   size_t key_len = key.length();
00353   m_var_index_buffer.ensure(key_len);
00354   memcpy(m_var_index_buffer.ptr, key.ptr, key_len);
00355   m_var_index_buffer.ptr += key_len;
00356 
00357   // Serialize offset into fix index buffer
00358   m_fix_index_buffer.ensure(sizeof(offset));
00359   memcpy(m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, &offset, sizeof(offset));
00360   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00361 
00362   m_trailer.index_entries++;
00363 }

00370 void
00371 CellStoreV0::open(const char *fname, const char *start_row,
00372                   const char *end_row) {
00373   m_start_row = (start_row) ? start_row : "";
00374   m_end_row = (end_row) ? end_row : Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00375 
00376   m_fd = -1;
00377 
00378   m_filename = fname;
00379 
00381   m_file_length = m_filesys->length(m_filename);
00382 
00383   if (m_file_length < m_trailer.size())
00384     HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_CORRUPT_CELLSTORE,
00385               "Bad length of CellStore file '%s' - %llu",
00386               m_filename.c_str(), (Llu)m_file_length);
00387 
00389   m_fd = m_filesys->open(m_filename);
00390 
00394   {
00395     uint32_t len;
00396     uint8_t *trailer_buf = new uint8_t [m_trailer.size()];
00397 
00398     len = m_filesys->pread(m_fd, trailer_buf, m_trailer.size(),
00399                            m_file_length - m_trailer.size());
00400 
00401     if (len != m_trailer.size())
00402       HT_THROWF(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR,
00403                 "Problem reading trailer for CellStore file '%s'"
00404                 " - only read %u of %lu bytes", m_filename.c_str(),
00405                 len, (Lu)m_trailer.size());
00406 
00407     m_trailer.deserialize(trailer_buf);
00408     delete [] trailer_buf;
00409   }
00410 
00412   if (m_trailer.version != 0)
00413     HT_THROWF(Error::VERSION_MISMATCH,
00414               "Unsupported CellStore version (%d) for file '%s'",
00415               m_trailer.version, fname);
00416 
00417   if (!(m_trailer.fix_index_offset < m_trailer.var_index_offset &&
00418         m_trailer.var_index_offset < m_file_length))
00419     HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_CORRUPT_CELLSTORE,
00420               "Bad index offsets in CellStore trailer fix=%u, var=%u, "
00421               "length=%llu, file='%s'", m_trailer.fix_index_offset,
00422               m_trailer.var_index_offset, (Llu)m_file_length, fname);
00423   
00424 }

00426 
00427 void CellStoreV0::load_index() {
00428   uint32_t amount, index_amount;
00429   uint8_t *fix_end;
00430   uint8_t *var_end;
00431   uint32_t len = 0;
00432   BlockCompressionHeader header;
00433   SerializedKey key;
00434   bool inflating_fixed=true;
00435   bool second_try = false;
00436 
00437   m_compressor = create_block_compression_codec();
00438 
00439   amount = index_amount = (m_file_length - m_trailer.size())
00440                           - m_trailer.fix_index_offset;
00441 
00442  try_again:
00443 
00444   try {
00445     DynamicBuffer buf(amount);
00446 
00447     if (second_try)
00448       reopen_fd();
00449 
00451     len = m_filesys->pread(m_fd, buf.ptr, amount, m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00452 
00453     if (len != amount)
00454       HT_THROWF(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, "Error loading index for "
00455                 "CellStore '%s' : tried to read %d but only got %d",
00456                 m_filename.c_str(), amount, len);
00458     buf.ptr += (m_trailer.var_index_offset - m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00459     m_compressor->inflate(buf, m_fix_index_buffer, header);
00460 
00461     inflating_fixed = false;
00462 
00463     if (!header.check_magic(INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC))
00464       HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC, m_filename);
00465 
00467     DynamicBuffer vbuf(0, false);
00468     amount = (m_file_length-m_trailer.size()) - m_trailer.var_index_offset;
00469     vbuf.base = buf.ptr;
00470     vbuf.ptr = buf.ptr + amount;
00471 
00472     m_compressor->inflate(vbuf, m_var_index_buffer, header);
00473 
00474     if (!header.check_magic(INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC))
00475       HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC, m_filename);
00476   }
00477   catch (Exception &e) {
00478     String msg;
00479     if (inflating_fixed) {
00480       msg = String("Error inflating FIXED index for cellstore '") + m_filename + "'";
00481       HT_ERROR_OUT << msg << ": "<< e << HT_END;
00482     }
00483     else {
00484       msg = "Error inflating VARIABLE index for cellstore '" + m_filename + "'";
00485       HT_ERROR_OUT << msg << ": " <<  e << HT_END;
00486     }
00487     HT_ERROR_OUT << "pread(fd=" << m_fd << ", len=" << len << ", amount="
00488         << index_amount << ")\n" << HT_END;
00489     HT_ERROR_OUT << m_trailer << HT_END;
00490     if (second_try)
00491       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, msg);
00492     second_try = true;
00493     goto try_again;
00494   }
00495 
00496   m_index.clear();
00497 
00498   uint32_t offset;
00499 
00500   // record end offsets for sanity checking and reset ptr
00501   fix_end = m_fix_index_buffer.ptr;
00502   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr = m_fix_index_buffer.base;
00503   var_end = m_var_index_buffer.ptr;
00504   m_var_index_buffer.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.base;
00505 
00506   for (size_t i=0; i< m_trailer.index_entries; i++) {
00507     assert(m_fix_index_buffer.ptr < fix_end);
00508     assert(m_var_index_buffer.ptr < var_end);
00509 
00510     // Deserialized cell key (variable portion)
00511     key.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.ptr;
00512     m_var_index_buffer.ptr += key.length();
00513 
00514     // Deserialize offset
00515     memcpy(&offset, m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, sizeof(offset));
00516     m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00517 
00518     m_index.insert(m_index.end(), IndexMap::value_type(key, offset));
00519   }
00520 
00524   {
00525     uint32_t start = 0;
00526     uint32_t end = (uint32_t)m_file_length;
00527     size_t start_row_length = m_start_row.length() + 1;
00528     size_t end_row_length = m_end_row.length() + 1;
00529     DynamicBuffer dbuf(7 + std::max(start_row_length, end_row_length));
00530     SerializedKey serkey;
00531     CellStoreV0::IndexMap::const_iterator iter, mid_iter, end_iter;
00532 
00533     dbuf.clear();
00534     create_key_and_append(dbuf, m_start_row.c_str());
00535     serkey.ptr = dbuf.base;
00536     iter = m_index.upper_bound(serkey);
00537     start = (*iter).second;
00538 
00539     dbuf.clear();
00540     create_key_and_append(dbuf, m_end_row.c_str());
00541     serkey.ptr = dbuf.base;
00542     if ((end_iter = m_index.lower_bound(serkey)) == m_index.end())
00543       end = m_file_length;
00544     else
00545       end = (*end_iter).second;
00546 
00547     m_disk_usage = end - start;
00548 
00549     size_t i=0;
00550     for (mid_iter=iter; iter!=end_iter; ++iter,++i) {
00551       if ((i%2)==0)
00552         ++mid_iter;
00553     }
00554     if (mid_iter != m_index.end())
00555       record_split_row((*mid_iter).first);
00556   }
00557 
00558   delete m_compressor;
00559   m_compressor = 0;
00560   delete [] m_fix_index_buffer.release();
00561 }
00562 
00563 
00567 void CellStoreV0::display_block_info() {
00568   SerializedKey last_key;
00569   uint32_t last_offset = 0;
00570   uint32_t block_size;
00571   size_t i=0;
00572   for (IndexMap::const_iterator iter = m_index.begin();
00573        iter != m_index.end(); ++iter) {
00574     if (last_key) {
00575       block_size = (*iter).second - last_offset;
00576       cout << i << ": offset=" << last_offset << " size=" << block_size
00577            << " row=" << last_key.row() << endl;
00578       i++;
00579     }
00580     last_offset = (*iter).second;
00581     last_key = (*iter).first;
00582   }
00583   if (last_key) {
00584     block_size = m_trailer.filter_offset - last_offset;
00585     cout << i << ": offset=" << last_offset << " size=" << block_size
00586          << " row=" << last_key.row() << endl;
00587   }
00588 }

00591 
00592 void CellStoreV0::record_split_row(const SerializedKey key) {
00593   std::string split_row = key.row();
00594   if (split_row > m_start_row && split_row < m_end_row)
00595     m_split_row = split_row;
00596 }
